programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective

All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon – footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the ‘dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.desc: Desperate for revenge, a young man enlists the aid of a medium to help him track down his sister's killer.

programme.title: Tiger On Beat

programme.title: Security
programme.desc: A security guard protects an eleven year-old girl who is being targeted by a gang for participating as a trial witness.

programme.title: The Battle: Roar To Victory
programme.desc: Over a 4 day period, a fierce battle takes place between Korean independence militias and Japanese forces in Manchuria, China.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two friends who are students at Korean National Police University, find themselves in an endless race against time after they witness a kidnapping and decide to track it down.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: Yong hears a stranger's voice from the future, connecting them to each other and sharing their love stories.

programme.title: Wheels On Meals
programme.desc: Two mobile restaurant owners team up with their detective friend to save the beautiful woman who was a pickpocket.

programme.title: Trouble
programme.desc: A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children and must learn how to survive on the big-city streets.

programme.title: The Girl In The Photographs
programme.desc: A bored young woman in a sleepy community called Spearfish starts receiving photographs of brutally murdered young women

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America
programme.desc: John starts his travels by visiting with up-and-coming trans reggaeton artist, Villano Antillano, who is changing the face and the rules of the game with her music and her existence.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The winter is mild and wet, which is good news for some but bad news for others. Red deer are forced to higher ground, salmon have gone six months without food, mountain hares turn a conspicuous white, and squirrels kick their own young out of the nest.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Visit Houston, Texas to try a next level, mouth watering burger that might be just the biggest one ever seen and a New York quintessential steakhouse sample their expertly cooked dry-aged porterhouse.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Sample some Japanese pho, lovingly prepared with precision. Then go to France through the amazing food we consume at a unique country chic, Palm Springs eatery.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Today, it’s all about Italian fare. Try some creative modern Italian food from a shop front in Hoboken in New Jersey and delicious pasta in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw discovers a host of delights in Japan. On the wintry northern island of Hokkaido, he samples sea urchin, pond smelt and boutique cheesecake.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: Adam goes to sea with the fishermen who caught the so-called `million-dollar tuna'. He also meets a soy sauce maker who saved his staff from the 2011 tsunami.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw continues his culinary tour of Japan, preparing fresh sushi and taking a trip to his wife's hometown to indulge in a little home cooking.

programme.title: Mega Transports Specials
programme.desc: A unique mega transport made of steel and titanium with a special purpose: to extract tons of gold. This so-called autoclave is the biggest of its kind.

programme.title: Mega Transports Specials
programme.desc: This giant magnet will revolutionize the world and energy production in the future. The world's largest nuclear fusion reactor is currently under construction in southern France.

programme.title: Dinosaur Cold Case
programme.desc: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson embeds with the team of one of the most extreme, avalanche-prone mountain ski mountains in the world - Snowbird. They battle to keep the steep and deep slopes safe with shovels, snowcats and even a WWII Howitzer cannon.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes to the biggest automated package sorting facility in the world - UPS Worldport in Louisville, Kentucky. Two million packages go through here every day, and it's up to the hardhat heroes behind the scenes to make it all happen.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, Mike Davidson is on streets, in tunnels, on tracks and in trolley restoration garages - working shoulder-to-shoulder with the team that keeps one of America's largest and oldest mass transit systems running smoothly and on time.

programme.title: Exceptional Engineering S2
programme.desc: Over 16,000 workers and engineers design, produce and deliver industry leading aircraft throughout the European Union at the Airbus factory in Hamburg-Finkenwerder.

programme.title: Exceptional Engineering S2
programme.desc: Every ten minutes, a new truck rolls off the assembly line, with a tailor-made production line equipped to cater to individual customer requirements at the Swedish automotive group, Volvo.

programme.title: Exceptional Engineering S2
programme.desc: In the Meyer Shipyard in Lower Saxony, the world's first natural gas cruise liner is under construction. There’s room for up to 6,600 passengers, a television broadcast studio and a theater on the 337 meter long ship.

programme.title: Janet Jackson: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Noted for her fierce independence, her magnetic aura and her ever so charming voice, Janet Jackson became a catalyst for her growth on MTV; embracing her identity, and reaching up to the heights of stardom.

programme.title: The Barbie Story

programme.title: Queen Elizabeth: A Lifetime Of Service

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song “just for them”, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;he’s forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.desc: In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon – footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the ‘dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm

programme.title: Jurassic Park

programme.title: Jurassic World Rebirth: The Making Of A New Era
programme.desc: Journey to the most dangerous place on Earth in this broadcast special that takes you behind-the-scenes of JURASSIC WORLD REBIRTH. The stars and filmmakers transport you from Thailand to Malta, revealing sets, stunts and dinosaurs that have never been seen before.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049

programme.title: Terminator Salvation

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Jurassic World Rebirth: The Making Of A New Era

programme.title: S.W.A.T.

programme.title: The Woman King

programme.title: The Patriot

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 6
programme.desc: At a sporting goods store, a confused customer debates the laws of physics with Michael after he suddenly makes a lightweight box impossibly heavy. Then as a barista, Michael shows caf� patrons that glass is not nearly as impenetrable as it seems. Plus, he spooks museum workers when he shows that boomerangs really do always come back, and that taxidermy is a less than permanent solution.

programme.desc: Stone Age Earth: In the presence of a mysterious black obelisk, pre-humans discover the use of tools--and weapons--violently taking first steps toward intelligence. 1999: On Earth's moon astronauts uncover another mysterious black obelisk. 2001: Between Earth and Jupiter, the spacecraft's intelligent computer makes a mistake that kills most of the human crew--then continues to kill to hide its error. Beyond Time: The sole survivor of the journey to Jupiter ascends to the next level of humanity.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 7
programme.desc: After some concerning interactions in town, Clark is determined to protect his secret identity - a task complicated by Jonathan and Jordan.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 04
programme.desc: Señor Solución discovers a hack that gets him back in the mood, and Kevin and Brooke reveal fan hacks for cooling down a hot bed. Plus, get revenge on rigged arcades with hacks to make the claw machine cough up a sweet prize.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 04
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q hit the supermarket to mess with shoppers in an epic game of Hide-and-Sneak, the guys draw straws at a BBQ joint, and tonight's loser gets a bad case of stage fright while giving the performance of his life.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 6
programme.desc: At a sporting goods store, a confused customer debates the laws of physics with Michael after he suddenly makes a lightweight box impossibly heavy. Then as a barista, Michael shows caf� patrons that glass is not nearly as impenetrable as it seems. Plus, he spooks museum workers when he shows that boomerangs really do always come back, and that taxidermy is a less than permanent solution.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: Feel the endorphin rush as 20 of the World's Dumbest Thrillseekers do their thing. We've got a motorcycle crash, an out of control skydiver, even an angry bison. And one thing ties them all together - outrageous fails. With hair-raising commentary from our cast of comedians, including Michael O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold

programme.title: Arrow S2 14
programme.desc: As Laurel continues to unravel, Oliver & Lance try to convince Sara to stay in Starling city and reunite with Laurel and their mother -- but the League of Assassins wants Sara back

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 04
programme.desc: Señor Solución discovers a hack that gets him back in the mood, and Kevin and Brooke reveal fan hacks for cooling down a hot bed. Plus, get revenge on rigged arcades with hacks to make the claw machine cough up a sweet prize.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 04
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q hit the supermarket to mess with shoppers in an epic game of Hide-and-Sneak, the guys draw straws at a BBQ joint, and tonight's loser gets a bad case of stage fright while giving the performance of his life.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 7
programme.desc: After some concerning interactions in town, Clark is determined to protect his secret identity - a task complicated by Jonathan and Jordan.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: Feel the endorphin rush as 20 of the World's Dumbest Thrillseekers do their thing. We've got a motorcycle crash, an out of control skydiver, even an angry bison. And one thing ties them all together - outrageous fails. With hair-raising commentary from our cast of comedians, including Michael O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 20
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test their craziest hack yet: cooking a three-course meal under the hood of a car…while driving! Plus, Kevin finds out who can spot his fresh breath hack, and one family spends three months living in a Hack House.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 01
programme.desc: Gather 'round for a most hackful holiday celebration, as Brooke and Kevin demonstrate how to navigate any holiday office party like a pro Elf, and explain how the ball drop became a New Year's tradition.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 02
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke hack their way through the worst obstacles an airport has to offer, and viewers share their DIY solutions for whipping up cream. Plus, Brooke and Kevin find out how low prices can go if you're a "good guy."

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 03
programme.desc: Skip a trip to the spa with a facial hack you can find in any schoolkid's book bag, and learn how to treat yourself like it's your birthday - any day of the year. Plus, Brooke and Kevin go for a swim… in a garbage bag.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 04
programme.desc: Señor Solución discovers a hack that gets him back in the mood, and Kevin and Brooke reveal fan hacks for cooling down a hot bed. Plus, get revenge on rigged arcades with hacks to make the claw machine cough up a sweet prize.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Hey -- wish WE'D thought of that! TruTV counts down of the 20... uh, SMARTEST inventions to ever hit the market. There's a flask for your butt, a way to re-shape your meat, and the last doughnut security system you'll ever need. Our consumer-friendlycomics, including Sean Donnelly, Gilbert Gottfried, Chris Fairbanks, and Mike Trainor are on hand to finalize the sale. Order yours now!

programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: The World - Episode 28
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's going on in our world. At 9pm AEST, Manny Tsigas brings you the latest international news and interviews with correspondents and guests.

programme.title: Close Of Business - Episode 23
programme.desc: Alicia Barry presents a weekly roundup of business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and overseas markets, analysing what's going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: Alone Australia - Episode 2
programme.desc: Ten survivalists are dropped into the West Coast Ranges of Tasmania for the challenge of a lifetime: to survive in the wild without any human contact.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 29
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 29
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: Christopher Lambert and Sean Connery star in the epic tale of immortality that launched one of the most beloved action-adventure series in film and TV history.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Before Holly’s husband died, he made plans for her. Over the course of the year after his death, she will receive letters, gifts, and instructions on how to be happy again.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood is the "Man With No Name," who teams up with equally lethal Lee Van Cleef in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic.

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: Christopher Lambert and Sean Connery star in the epic tale of immortality that launched one of the most beloved action-adventure series in film and TV history.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars
programme.desc: A stranger in San Miguel becomes involved in a vendetta between two families. Playing one family against the other, he rescues a beautiful woman from captivity.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

programme.title: World Trade Center
programme.desc: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series Of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars
programme.desc: A stranger in San Miguel becomes involved in a vendetta between two families. Playing one family against the other, he rescues a beautiful woman from captivity.

programme.title: The Hunt For Red October
programme.desc: A deadly battle of wits ensues between the navies of the United States and the U.S.S.R when the Soviet Union's most advanced nuclear submarine makes an unauthorized approach to America's eastern seaboard.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Grandeur Nature
programme.desc: At the Maison du Parc-Botrange, Adrien meets Vinciane Schockert, a zoologist with a passion for nature. For her, it's time to see our green spaces for what they are: open-air universities. Then musician Noe Preszow gives us a vocal performance in a magnificent setting.

programme.title: Kavalkades
programme.desc: In the Isere, Mathilde Labat meets Julien, a western riding enthusiast. Then to the Drome where emilie, physiotherapist, puts her patients on horseback. Finally, in the Puy-de-Dome, Laurent and Romane have set themselves a crazy challenge, to relaunch a breed on the verge of extinction, the Auvergne horse.

programme.title: La Vigne Est Belle
programme.desc: Each year, Quebec's winegrowers fear the springtime frost, Voldemort. Simon from La Bauge and Matthieu from Nival go to great lengths to keep their vines warm and protect the future harvest. The Guatemalan and Mexican seasonal workers contribute to this success and share their stories.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Entering the world of Quentin Garel, is like stepping onto an unknown planet filled with animal sculptures that defy the imagination. Creatures he brings vividly to life in his studio deep in rural Normandy...

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: L'epicerie
programme.desc: Controversial due to health risks, some food additives, banned in the rest of the world, remain authorized in Canada. Also: the magic of bouillon cubes; figs in Quebec; viewers' questions.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Kavalkades
programme.desc: In the Isere, Mathilde Labat meets Julien, a western riding enthusiast. Then to the Drome where emilie, physiotherapist, puts her patients on horseback. Finally, in the Puy-de-Dome, Laurent and Romane have set themselves a crazy challenge, to relaunch a breed on the verge of extinction, the Auvergne horse.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness
programme.desc: Tobias returns to the Tree to clear the name of Nils Amen, whom his woodcutting people accuse of treason.

programme.title: L'epicerie
programme.desc: Controversial due to health risks, some food additives, banned in the rest of the world, remain authorized in Canada. Also: the magic of bouillon cubes; figs in Quebec; viewers' questions.

programme.title: Grandeur Nature
programme.desc: At the Maison du Parc-Botrange, Adrien meets Vinciane Schockert, a zoologist with a passion for nature. For her, it's time to see our green spaces for what they are: open-air universities. Then musician Noe Preszow gives us a vocal performance in a magnificent setting.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: And what if you left the reality of being human behind to explore the world as if you were an animal or plant. A well-known figure from Romandy takes up the challenge of discovering what it is like to be a totally different species, feeling and living as they do.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Rosa and her colleagues have to find Simon and Adelina, whose lives are under threat. Leo Mott, the village policeman is also under pressure: he was having an affair with one of the victims. Manfred Kägi uncovers an interesting lead that confronts him with his family's past.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: The noose begins to tighten around Mott, who commits an act of desperation. Rosa reveals to Manfred Kägi that he is the father of her son. A clue leads them on the trail of a serial rapist. Could he be the author of the triple murder?

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: We plunge into the world and workshop of Nicolas Alquin to discover his creations, intended for the ''elle et le Chemin'' exhibition, in the church of Fontevraud Abbey.

programme.title: Tartuffe Theoreme
programme.desc: Who is Tartuffe? What is control, predation, consent? A middle-class family is divided over an odd and charismatic pious fraud, condemns him, fantasizes about him or loves him... Between fantasy and social satire, an adaptation in the form of a Gothic novel.

programme.title: Sauver Ou Perir
programme.desc: Franck, a fireman in Paris, is happy. He loves his job, his wife has just given birth to twins... But soon, his life turns upside-down. Severely burned during a difficult operation whilst trying to save his men, his face melted in the flames. He now begins a long, slow reconstruction...

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: And what if you left the reality of being human behind to explore the world as if you were an animal or plant. A well-known figure from Romandy takes up the challenge of discovering what it is like to be a totally different species, feeling and living as they do.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: La Vigne Est Belle
programme.desc: Even during the winter, Quebec's winegrowers are busy! Watch these skilled craftsmen as they create their natural sparkling wine, follow their preparations as they bring the vineyards to life and discover their guiding spirit. As springtime arrives, all fear a late frost, which could harm the future harvests.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: From the small to the monumental, eric de Dormael's works are architectural in structure, playing with light and shade like ''shimmering sunshine on leaves or sunlight as it filters through shutter blinds''.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 53
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 5
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 9
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 38
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 53
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 1
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Brush ep 3
programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother’s unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 9
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 2
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
